title: "Fortalecimiento Sexual a través de la Visualización y Ejercicios Físicos"
first_phrase: In the previous text, we learned about how visualization can improve future performance, especially in sexual performance. In this last part, we focus on physical methodologies that can enhance sexual efficacy in men and women. Specific exercises, based on gym and sexual positions, when done over time, can significantly improve physical and sexual capacity. Additionally, there's a discussion about different types of orgasms and the possibility of multiorgasmia. This knowledge, combined with a practical experience, is essential for those who desire to improve their sexual prowess.
